title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Jimbo Fisher's comments responding to Nick Saban. Who looks worse after what they said? Alan Shipnuck discusses writing the tell-all book about Phil Mickelson that sent shockwaves across the sport. Hootie and The Blowfish Drummer Jim Sonefeld shares some of the troubles he went through while touring with the band.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
